text: Black News Channel was an American pay television news channel. It was targeted the African American demographic. It was based in Tallahassee, Florida, and launched on February 10, 2020. The network filed for bankruptcy in March 2022 and was subsequently purchased by Byron Allen's Entertainment Studios. It later merged with TheGrio. Category:American television channels Category:2020 establishments in the United States Category:2022 disestablishments in the United States
title: Black News Channel
